con:testCase.name: TestCase_Virt_OCS10-PackageManagement
con:testCase.con:description: Tests ocs10 mock with different responses and error messages based on interface documentation: svn://svn.sg.de.pri.o2.com/DealerPortal/DirectRecharge/trunk/SRs/Interfaces/OCS/OCS Service Management Interface for To2 DE v1 1 Rev 04_10-03-2011.doc $ 7.4

con:response.con:responseContent: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:add="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2004/08/addressing" xmlns:v1="http://www.telefonica.com/OCS/To2DE/OCS_types/v1_1"> <soapenv:Header> <add:MessageID>http://www.your.gov/certo/dare</add:MessageID> </soapenv:Header> <soapenv:Body> <v1:subscribePackageResponse> <v1:appInfo> <!--type: ApplicationIdType--> <v1:applicationId>gero et</v1:applicationId> <!--type: ErReferenceType--> <v1:reference>sonoras imperio</v1:reference> </v1:appInfo> <v1:result> <!--type: OpReferenceType--> <v1:opReference>quae divum incedo</v1:opReference> <!--type: dateTime--> <v1:opExecutionDate>2006-08-19T19:27:14+02:00</v1:opExecutionDate> <v1:opCost exponent="3" currencyCode="turbine corripuit">3</v1:opCost> <v1:subscriberId> <!--You have a CHOICE of the next 4 items at this level--> <!--type: E164NumberType--> <v1:e164Number>regemque dedit</v1:e164Number> <!--type: string--> <v1:userName>fremunt celsa</v1:userName> <!--type: anyURI--> <v1:anyURI>http://www.my.com/profundum/sceptra</v1:anyURI> <v1:ipAddress> <!--You have a CHOICE of the next 2 items at this level--> <!--type: Ipv4AddressType--> <v1:ipv4Address>turbine corripuit scopuloque</v1:ipv4Address> <!--type: Ipv6AddressType--> <v1:ipv6Address>flammato secum dea</v1:ipv6Address> </v1:ipAddress> </v1:subscriberId> <!--type: string--> <v1:serviceProviderId>profundum quippe ferant</v1:serviceProviderId> <v1:balance exponent="3" currencyCode="nubibus ignem disiecitque">3</v1:balance> <!--Optional:--> <!--type: string--> <v1:promotionalCode>ac vinclis et</v1:promotionalCode> <v1:lifeCycleStatus> <!--type: LifeCycleStateType - enumeration: [A,I,L,P,T,W,X]--> <v1:state>L</v1:state> <!--type: LifeCycleSubStateType--> <v1:subState>ac vinclis</v1:subState> </v1:lifeCycleStatus> <!--type: TariffPlanIdType--> <v1:tariffPlanId>speluncis abdidit</v1:tariffPlanId> </v1:result> <!--type: PackageIdType--> <v1:packageId>aris imponet honorem</v1:packageId> <!--Optional:--> <v1:amount exponent="3">3</v1:amount> <!--Optional:--> <!--type: dateTime--> <v1:startDate>2000-09-25T08:18:09</v1:startDate> <!--Optional:--> <!--type: dateTime--> <v1:endDate>2015-11-05T05:47:14</v1:endDate> <!--Optional:--> <!--type: boolean--> <v1:cyclicPackageFlag>false</v1:cyclicPackageFlag> <!--Optional:--> <!--type: dateTime--> <v1:firstExecutionDate>2017-04-19T16:38:57+02:00</v1:firstExecutionDate> <!--Optional:--> <v1:timePeriod> <!--Optional:--> <v1:referenceDay> <!--You have a CHOICE of the next 2 items at this level--> <!--type: gDay--> <v1:dayOfMonth>---06+02:00</v1:dayOfMonth> <!--type: string--> <v1:currentInterval>talia flammato secum</v1:currentInterval> </v1:referenceDay> <!--type: duration--> <v1:duration>P1Y4M2DT13H45M33S</v1:duration> </v1:timePeriod> </v1:subscribePackageResponse> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:configuration.con:originalMessage:
<S:Envelope xmlns:S="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/"> <S:Header> <add:MessageID xmlns:add="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2004/08/addressing">urn:uuid:7c15955c-7413-4ab2-8dc9-67d6aa504aae</add:MessageID> </S:Header> <!--Documentation for using OCS 10 mock service.packageManagement
Mock service despatch soapFault service excepction response, if MSISDN in request is: - null, empty or not numeric - MSISDN < 1 or MSISDN > 15 signs
Mock service despatch default response with values from request and default values from mock service like current response below. Default balance configured by mock is - 1000
To order custom soap fault response with expected values, MSISDN in request must be in format:
- MSISDN prefix must be: - 49113
- Position 6: 1 - for service exception with errorType=PERMANENT 2 - for service exception with errorType=TRANSIENT 3 - for policy exception with errorType=PERMANENT x - for service exception default response
- Positions 7-14 = last 8 signs from expected error code in response Ex. MSISDN = 49113198800012 returns <ns3:errorCode>98800012</ns3:errorCode>
Example soap fault response for MSISDN above: <soap:Envelope xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/"> <soap:Body> <soap:Fault> <faultcode>soap:Server</faultcode> <faultstring>Mock: OCS10-PackageManagement-Service. Soap fault exception</faultstring> <detail> <ns3:serviceException xmlns="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2004/08/addressing" xmlns:ns2="http://www.w3.org/2000/09/xmldsig#" xmlns:ns3="http://www.telefonica.com/OCS/To2DE/OCS_types/v1_1" xmlns:ns4="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2002/04/secext"> <ns3:errorCode>98800012</ns3:errorCode> <ns3:errorType>Permanent</ns3:errorType> <ns3:text>Please see error code description in specification</ns3:text> <ns3:variables>variable-1</ns3:variables> </ns3:serviceException> </detail> </soap:Fault> </soap:Body> </soap:Envelope>
End of documentation--> <S:Body> <ns2:subscribePackageResponse xmlns="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2004/08/addressing" xmlns:ns2="http://www.telefonica.com/OCS/To2DE/OCS_types/v1_1" xmlns:ns3="http://www.w3.org/2000/09/xmldsig#" xmlns:ns4="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2002/04/secext"> <ns2:appInfo> <ns2:applicationId>D22</ns2:applicationId> <ns2:reference>2525669df8414799ad542ff4c19a3da3</ns2:reference> </ns2:appInfo> <ns2:result> <ns2:opReference>0b73316bc98c41f698b94a99f8032bfb</ns2:opReference> <ns2:opExecutionDate>2016-10-24T15:30:19+02:00</ns2:opExecutionDate> <ns2:opCost currencyCode="EUR" exponent="-2">499</ns2:opCost> <ns2:subscriberId> <ns2:e164Number>4915931220906</ns2:e164Number> </ns2:subscriberId> <ns2:serviceProviderId>02</ns2:serviceProviderId> <ns2:balance currencyCode="EUR" exponent="-2">501</ns2:balance> <ns2:lifeCycleStatus> <ns2:state>A</ns2:state> <ns2:subState>R</ns2:subState> </ns2:lifeCycleStatus> <ns2:tariffPlanId>B1</ns2:tariffPlanId> </ns2:result> <ns2:packageId>f0b33cec7b314779886bbcc714d76e3f</ns2:packageId> <ns2:amount exponent="0">1024000</ns2:amount> <ns2:startDate>2016-10-24T15:30:19+02:00</ns2:startDate> <ns2:endDate>2016-11-23T15:30:19+01:00</ns2:endDate> <ns2:cyclicPackageFlag>false</ns2:cyclicPackageFlag> </ns2:subscribePackageResponse> </S:Body> </S:Envelope>

<S:Envelope xmlns:S="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/"> <S:Header> <add:MessageID xmlns:add="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2004/08/addressing">urn:uuid:7c15955c-7413-4ab2-8dc9-67d6aa504aae</add:MessageID> </S:Header> <!--Documentation for using OCS 10 mock service.packageManagement

Soap fault exception</faultstring> <detail> <ns2:serviceException xmlns="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2004/08/addressing" xmlns:ns2="http://www.telefonica.com/OCS/To2DE/OCS_types/v1_1" xmlns:ns3="http://www.w3.org/2000/09/xmldsig#" xmlns:ns4="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2002/04/secext"> <ns2:errorCode>99999</ns2:errorCode> <ns2:errorType>PERMANENT</ns2:errorType> <ns2:text>Please see error code description in specification</ns2:text> <ns2:variables>variable-1</ns2:variables> </ns2:serviceException> </detail> </ns2:Fault> </S:Body> </S:Envelope>

<S:Envelope xmlns:S="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/"> <S:Header> <add:MessageID xmlns:add="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2004/08/addressing">urn:uuid:7c15955c-7413-4ab2-8dc9-67d6aa504aae</add:MessageID> </S:Header> <!--Documentation for using OCS 10 mock service.packageManagement
Mock service despatch soapFault service excepction response, if MSISDN in request is: - null, empty or not numeric - MSISDN < 1 or MSISDN > 15 signs
Mock service despatch default response with values from request and default values from mock service like current response below. Default balance configured by mock is - 1000
To order custom soap fault response with expected values, MSISDN in request must be in format:
- MSISDN prefix must be: - 49113
- Position 6: 1 - for service exception with errorType=PERMANENT 2 - for service exception with errorType=TRANSIENT 3 - for policy exception with errorType=PERMANENT x - for service exception default response
- Positions 7-14 = last 8 signs from expected error code in response Ex. MSISDN = 49113198800012 returns <ns3:errorCode>98800012</ns3:errorCode>
Example soap fault response for MSISDN above: <soap:Envelope xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/"> <soap:Body> <soap:Fault> <faultcode>soap:Server</faultcode> <faultstring>Mock: OCS10-PackageManagement-Service. Soap fault exception</faultstring> <detail> <ns3:serviceException xmlns="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2004/08/addressing" xmlns:ns2="http://www.w3.org/2000/09/xmldsig#" xmlns:ns3="http://www.telefonica.com/OCS/To2DE/OCS_types/v1_1" xmlns:ns4="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2002/04/secext"> <ns3:errorCode>98800012</ns3:errorCode> <ns3:errorType>Permanent</ns3:errorType> <ns3:text>Please see error code description in specification</ns3:text> <ns3:variables>variable-1</ns3:variables> </ns3:serviceException> </detail> </soap:Fault> </soap:Body> </soap:Envelope>
End of documentation--> <S:Body> <ns2:subscribePackageResponse xmlns="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2004/08/addressing" xmlns:ns2="http://www.telefonica.com/OCS/To2DE/OCS_types/v1_1" xmlns:ns3="http://www.w3.org/2000/09/xmldsig#" xmlns:ns4="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2002/04/secext"> <ns2:appInfo> <ns2:applicationId>D22</ns2:applicationId> <ns2:reference>2525669df8414799ad542ff4c19a3da3</ns2:reference> </ns2:appInfo> <ns2:result> <ns2:opReference>0b73316bc98c41f698b94a99f8032bfb</ns2:opReference> <ns2:opExecutionDate>2016-10-24T15:30:19+02:00</ns2:opExecutionDate> <ns2:opCost currencyCode="EUR" exponent="-2">499</ns2:opCost> <ns2:subscriberId> <ns2:e164Number>4915931220906</ns2:e164Number> </ns2:subscriberId> <ns2:serviceProviderId>02</ns2:serviceProviderId> <ns2:balance currencyCode="EUR" exponent="-2">501</ns2:balance> <ns2:lifeCycleStatus> <ns2:state>A</ns2:state> <ns2:subState>R</ns2:subState> </ns2:lifeCycleStatus> <ns2:tariffPlanId>B1</ns2:tariffPlanId> </ns2:result> <ns2:packageId>f0b33cec7b314779886bbcc714d76e3f</ns2:packageId> <ns2:amount exponent="0">1024000</ns2:amount> <ns2:startDate>2016-10-24T15:30:19+02:00</ns2:startDate> <ns2:endDate>2016-11-23T15:30:19+01:00</ns2:endDate> <ns2:cyclicPackageFlag>false</ns2:cyclicPackageFlag> </ns2:subscribePackageResponse> </S:Body> </S:Envelope>
